languages.text: {n}Саргона дергается как от удара. Его вкрадчивый шепот становится замогильным.{/n} "Нам обоим предстоит умереть, фон Валанциус. Но даже зная это, я лучше промолчу. Ты и не представляешь, с кем связал{mf|ся|ась}".

{n}Sargona flinches as if from a blow. His soft whisper takes on a sinister note:{/n} "Both of us are going to die here, von Valancius, but even so, I would rather not say. You have no idea who you are up against."
languages.original_text: {n}Саргона дергается как от удара. Его вкрадчивый шепот становится замогильным.{/n} "Нам обоим предстоит умереть, фон Валанциус. Но даже зная это, я лучше промолчу. Ты и не представляешь, с кем связал{mf|ся|ась}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona flinches as if from a blow. His soft whisper takes on a sinister note:{/n} "Both of us are going to die, von Valancius. But even so, I would rather not say. You have no idea who you are up against."

{n}Sargona flinches as if from a blow. His soft whisper takes on a sinister note:{/n} "Both of us are going to die here, von Valancius, but even so, I would rather not say. You have no idea who you are up against."

languages.text: {n}Sargona se encoge, como si hubiera recibido un golpe. Su suave susurro adquiere un tono más siniestro:{/n} «Moriremos los dos aquí, von Valancius, pero, aun así, prefiero no hablar. No tienes ni idea de a quién te enfrentas».
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona flinches as if from a blow. His soft whisper takes on a sinister note:{/n} "Both of us are going to die here, von Valancius, but even so, I would rather not say. You have no idea who you are up against."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona se encoge, como si hubiera recibido un golpe. Su suave susurro adquiere un tono más siniestro:{/n} «Moriremos los dos aquí, von Valancius, pero, aun así, prefiero no hablar. No tienes ni idea de a quién te enfrentas».

languages.text: {n}萨戈纳退了一步，仿佛挨了一拳。他以耳语般的轻柔语调开了口，声音中充满了恶意。{/n}“你我二人都会死在这里，冯·瓦兰修斯，可即便如此，我也不打算回答这个问题。你根本不知道你惹上了谁。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona flinches as if from a blow. His soft whisper takes on a sinister note:{/n} "Both of us are going to die here, von Valancius, but even so, I would rather not say. You have no idea who you are up against."

traits.locale_text: {n}萨戈纳退了一步，仿佛挨了一拳。他以耳语般的轻柔语调开了口，声音中充满了恶意。{/n}“你我二人都会死在这里，冯·瓦兰修斯，可即便如此，我也不打算回答这个问题。你根本不知道你惹上了谁。”

languages.text: {n}Sargona vacille comme si vous l'aviez giflé, et sa voix suave se pare d'un accent sinistre :{/n} « Ni vous ni moi ne sortirons d'ici vivants, von Valancius, mais quand bien même, je ne vous dirai rien. Vous n'avez pas idée de ce à quoi vous vous exposez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona flinches as if from a blow. His soft whisper takes on a sinister note:{/n} "Both of us are going to die here, von Valancius, but even so, I would rather not say. You have no idea who you are up against."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona vacille comme si vous l'aviez giflé, et sa voix suave se pare d'un accent sinistre :{/n} « Ni vous ni moi ne sortirons d'ici vivants, von Valancius, mais quand bien même, je ne vous dirai rien. Vous n'avez pas idée de ce à quoi vous vous exposez. »

languages.text: {n}サルゴナは不意の一撃のようにたじろぐ。彼の柔らかなささやきが不吉な忠告となる。{/n}「私たちはともにここで死ぬ、フォン・ヴァランシウス。しかしたとえそうであっても、私は言うつもりはない。お前が誰と戦っているのか検討もつかないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona flinches as if from a blow. His soft whisper takes on a sinister note:{/n} "Both of us are going to die here, von Valancius, but even so, I would rather not say. You have no idea who you are up against."

traits.locale_text: {n}サルゴナは不意の一撃のようにたじろぐ。彼の柔らかなささやきが不吉な忠告となる。{/n}「私たちはともにここで死ぬ、フォン・ヴァランシウス。しかしたとえそうであっても、私は言うつもりはない。お前が誰と戦っているのか検討もつかないだろう」

languages.text: {n}Sargona, darbe almış gibi sıçrıyor. Sesi, sinsi bir tona bürünüp hafif bir fısıltı hâlinde çıkıyor.{/n} "İkimiz de burada öleceğiz von Valancius. Yine de söylemem. Kiminle karşı karşıya olduğuna dair en ufak bir fikrin yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona flinches as if from a blow. His soft whisper takes on a sinister note:{/n} "Both of us are going to die here, von Valancius, but even so, I would rather not say. You have no idea who you are up against."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona, darbe almış gibi sıçrıyor. Sesi, sinsi bir tona bürünüp hafif bir fısıltı hâlinde çıkıyor.{/n} "İkimiz de burada öleceğiz von Valancius. Yine de söylemem. Kiminle karşı karşıya olduğuna dair en ufak bir fikrin yok."

languages.text: {n}Sargona zuckt zusammen. Sein sanftes Flüstern wird bedrohlich:{/n} "Wir werden hier beide sterben, von Valancius, aber ich verrate es Euch trotzdem nicht. Ihr habt keine Ahnung, mit wem Ihr Euch anlegt."
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona flinches as if from a blow. His soft whisper takes on a sinister note:{/n} "Both of us are going to die here, von Valancius, but even so, I would rather not say. You have no idea who you are up against."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona zuckt zusammen. Sein sanftes Flüstern wird bedrohlich:{/n} "Wir werden hier beide sterben, von Valancius, aber ich verrate es Euch trotzdem nicht. Ihr habt keine Ahnung, mit wem Ihr Euch anlegt."
